arts.ttl: Emotional Trent Alexander-Arnold returns to Anfield with Real Madrid to pay tribute to Diogo Jota
arts.sum: A heartfelt moment unfolded in Liverpool as a delegation from Real Madrid, comprising Trent Alexander-Arnold, Xabi Alonso, Dean Huijsen, and Emilio Butragueno, visited a mural near Anfield to pay tribute to Diogo Jota, the late Liverpool forward who tragically passed away this past summer. The Real Madrid representatives laid a bouquet at the memorial, a […] The post Emotional Trent Alexander-Arnold returns to Anfield with Real Madrid to pay tribute to Diogo Jota appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Real Madrid – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid on Tuesday for a crucial Champions League showdown, desperately needing to build on their weekend victory. A 2-0 win over Aston Villa finally ended a dreadful four-game losing streak in the Premier League. Now, the Reds must carry that momentum onto the European stage.
